website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction of people towards the New Balance 1540 v3 has been positive. Runners and those with underfoot problems believe that this motion control running shoe is consistent when it comes to stability. The durable and highly efficient construction is highlighted, as well. On the other hand, the upper unit’s tendency to scrape against the foot is criticized, as was the too-short shoelaces.The New Balance 1540 v3 is a stability running shoe that aims to deliver full-bodied support for overpronated motion and foot issues like plantar fasciitis.
pros: People stated that the New Balance 1540 v3 is versatile enough to handle various activities other than running
Several consumers claim that the underfoot experience is comfortable
The cover system is praised by those who like a secure and uncompromising in-shoe experience
This New Balance running shoe is apparently able to support heavyset runners, making it a durable and robust piece of performance wear
Most testers have expressed their appreciation for the stability mechanisms of this product, stating that their strides didn’t become cumbersome because of such features
The general durability of the materials is welcomed by many runners
cons: According to a few people, the height of the forefoot section has been shrunken, making the skin rub uncomfortably against the material
A couple of runners have expressed their frustration towards the too-short shoelaces

customer_reviews.title: I was sent USED and WORN Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: If I could do zero stars I would. I ordered these shoes for a gift for someone. I received them today and upon opening up the shoes, they are very worn and have a hole in the top of one of the shoes. When purchasing, I was lead to believe that these were brand new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pehrson

customer_reviews.title: A tad different
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this shoe in the previous version v2 for several years, but this one has taken me a month to get use to. Fonally had to undo the last hole for shoe string in order to get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I don’t know why more running shoes don’t come with a wide toe box. It makes no sense to me, when you run barefoot your toes splay out to give you stability, why wouldn’t you want your running shoes to allow this? This shoe gives your toes the room they need without making the shoe wide. It is the perfect running shoe. I’ve been running (well, jogging if we’re talking speed hah) for years and continually buy these or the 840’s. It runs true to size and while other companies would suggest buying a half size larger for running, because the toe box allows a little more space, I would order your actual size
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought New Balance shoes for years! This pair is the WORST. I have had them exactly 1 month and there is a hole in the top / front near the seam. The mesh seems very thin. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED for $180.00 I certainly expected better than this from New Balance. I checked to see if I could return them and that is not an option, I received them 6/3 and today is 7/6. Bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Forred

customer_reviews.title: How to order a specific width.
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if this NB Women's size 7 4WW is the same as a NB Women's size 7 2E. There wasn't an option to be specific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mesh on these does not last like the earlier versions
customer_reviews.text: 41 days after the return window closed these shoes had developed a hole in the toolbox of each one. I only purchase New Balance shoes oh, and I have always been extremely satisfied with them. However due to the holes these are a disappointment. As far as comfort goes they have great comfort and support just as the previous versions that lasted longer. The reason for the very low review is what a short time they lasted. If New Balance shoes store would replace or repair them I would be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Miller and J. M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Aren't really working for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are tight (narrow). I wear a medium width(B). The tongue of the shoe is very short. The shoe strings were short as well. I work on my feet all day in healthcare (hospital) and have been wearing these for several days now and could not wait to take these off at the end of the day. My heels hurt. I think if I would have purchased a wider width it may have been a better fit. Felt these were way over priced and expected way more from this expensive style.
customer_reviews.author: betz

customer_reviews.title: I have never had a pair that felt this good.
customer_reviews.text: I have over pronation in the right foot and I read about the shoes preventing overpronation and so far I have not had to put my insert in that I used to have to wear for my cavus foot. This is remarkable for a pair of shoes because my right foot was broken on both sides and it really has a bad rollover to the outside so far these shoes are supporting that foot these are the first shoes I’ve ever worn that have done this without some kind of an insert.
customer_reviews.author: paula gordon

customer_reviews.title: Running shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to find a running shoe in a narrow width. It has good support (pronation), rollbar and nice cushioning. It is more expensive than I would like, but I pay it to get the features I like. It is an attractive shoe also.
customer_reviews.author: M.  Davis

customer_reviews.title: My FEET and I thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find this shoe for the past two years. I was told by my local New Balance store that it was no longer available. My persistence to find a suitable replacement finally paid off, with the New Balance 1540V2. This running shoe provides the motion control, stability, and arch support that I need in a shoe. I've had reconstructive surgery on my left foot and a weak, fallen arch on the right, these shoes have allowed me to get back to running and power walking. They are great. I am ordering a second pair today. If you need a shoe to help with motion control and arch support, this is the shoe! Thank you New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia S.

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality - cheap knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering if these are really New Balance shoes. I wear New Balance all the time, have had many pairs of them, and I routinely wear down the soles but not once have I gotten a hole in the upper. I've only been wearing these on and off for four months (summer means more sandals than shoes) and both shoes have a hole near the big toe. These shoes are not inexpensive and should definitely last more than a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two pairs to get two widths!! My brace wouldn’t fit in my normal width. But, I’m steady on my feet and not stuffed in a shoe that won’t fit. Super comfortable. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best support and stability
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, I've bought at least 8 pairs over the years. Best comfort and stability of any walking/ running shoe I've owned. Lots of room in the toe box which I love. My only complaint is that the insoles are worthless so plan on buying inserts for the shoes, (I buy SuperFeet insoles).
customer_reviews.author: DebOL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit and support !
customer_reviews.text: First, I use these sneakers for everyday. After a foot injury, I found that I began to wear them at work when I didn't need to be in meetings. They have made all the difference in being able to walk for 2 to 3 miles without fatigue. This is version 3, however I have owned all the versions of this New Balance sneaker and will continue to purchase. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: C.Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. The V3 last fits perfectly. I wear a brace on one calf that fits down into the shoe. This fits really well with these shoes. I also have wide feet. All fits great.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Rymill

customer_reviews.title: Slightly different from previous version
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, however, materials feel different from previous version, maybe not as sturdy? The insole was folded over at the toe. Took me a few minutes to figure out why the toe on the right foot didn't feel right. I sometimes walk 7-8 miles a day. Hope they will hold out as well as the previous ones did.
customer_reviews.author: MRG

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for a good price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes on this planet and as for as I know the only shoes made in the USA what more can you say.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rowe

customer_reviews.title: The most disappointing New Balance I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing New Balance for about 20 years and almost always pay the extra price to buy the ones made in USA. I usually can wear my NB shoes for about a year (for walking only, not daily usage) before they break down and need to be replaced. This pair has developed a hole in the mesh at the point where it is seamed to the synthetic toe cap. I have only used them for walking about 5 times/week. I'm so disappointed in the quality of this shoe. I expect more for my $170.
customer_reviews.author: L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Fits the same
customer_reviews.text: I Like that this shoe remains from year to year. They fit both my gait and my feet. Very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and my orthodontics fit, making this a great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking/running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe provides excellent support and allows space for a orthotics. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Berenson

customer_reviews.title: Hope to be great
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn out yet but fit seems good. They are wide enough and right length. May need more arch support but orthotics fit or inserts can be swapped for some with more support. New Balance is the only brand that fits me usually but I wear out the heels fast and wish rubber was a bit tougher for many miles I put on them..
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Shoe doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these shoes for 3 1/2 months and the material is falling apart. The heel has torn where it rubs a blister and the outside of the shoe has a hole in the material. I am VERY dissapointed in these shoes. I only wear them to workout so I don't even wear them for more than 1 hr a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for a couple weeks now and haven't had any problems. I normally wear a size 7 1/2 or 8. Ordered a size 8 and it fits perfectly. Shoes are comfortable. Shoe laces are short as noted in some reviews, but you can still lace them up so it hasn't been a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: wahoowa91

customer_reviews.title: Like the look but not the fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the shoes. First pair were too small (my fault), but the second pair are hard to get on my feet without a struggle. It may just be me. And the toe bed looks too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lyles

customer_reviews.title: No laces & strong chemical smell in shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even try them on! They’re wee No shoe laces in them or the box. There was a strong chemical smell to them. Not the quality of New Balance I’ve purchased in a store. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: After trying to find the right size of shoe for this young lady it finally paid on. They fit perfect & don't hurt her bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Tell Burns

customer_reviews.title: I am going to order another pair before I change no longer available
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit & Support Rollbar Technology helps support my back as I work all day on my feet color matches my jeans
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Perez

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN USA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted blue sneakers made in USA. I buy them a a size bigger for extra comfort. I LOVE these they are gorgeous and NOT MADE IN CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Arika

customer_reviews.title: wass
customer_reviews.text: I have bought New Balance shoes for years! This pair is the WORST. I have had them exactly 1 month and there is a hole in the top / front near the seam. The mesh seems very thin. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED for $180.00 I certainly expected better than this from New Balance. I checked to see if
customer_reviews.author: T Fidel

customer_reviews.title: Fine shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I've purchased this shoe. They last a long time and are very comfortable for problem feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Gale

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for heavy women on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this brand and similar numbers (1540 V3) for years. They provide great support and do not hurt my feet. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christy T.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper price than shoe store I go to.
customer_reviews.text: Always buy this brand and knew what to expect. These shoes are doctor recommended for MY PLANTER FASCISTS.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! My feet finally feel better after wearing all day. Glad they are made in USA! A little too costly but my Amazon rewards helped.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I have worn New Balance for years, this model is recommended for over pronation on the New Balance website. These are not as comfortable as the top of the line (price-wise anyway) I’ve worn in the past purchased from a New Balance store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like the others.
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn New balance sneakers. I have a very active lifestyle and am on my feet all day. I have never had any problems with their sneakers, these on the other hand do not get my recommendation. They really hurt my feet and have no cushion in the heel. I feel like I just wasted a lot of money for sneakers I can’t even wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kurkulonis

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for arch support these won’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fit was not good for me but I have a high arch and these shoes did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Page

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, wrong shoe laces.
customer_reviews.text: Love New Balance shoes. The only part of these I am unhappy with is the shoelaces for not leave any lace to tie the shoes when laced up. I have to do a small knot until I get to the store for different laces.
customer_reviews.author: Bike

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, but thought they would wear better
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months insole fabric is rolling apart on outside the vinyl embossing is lifting off.
customer_reviews.author: Dw

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the only shoes that help relieve my plantar fasciitis. This is my third pair, they stabilize and support comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: KCH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for 5 months and both of them have developed holes. I wear these to work everyday, but I have a desk job, so they are not getting that much use. These are supposed to be good quality shoes and they should last longer than 5 months. Very disappointed in the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P Karch

customer_reviews.title: A great stable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA. Offered in wide widths. Inserts can be removed and replaced with your own custom insole arch supports. My 4th pair of this model. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this shoe several times before, just in a different color. I did t expect for it to fit differently. It’s tight in the toe box of my left foot mainly but not as comfortable as before.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Rubs my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3-4 previous pairs of the 1540’s. This particular pair must have sides slightly higher because both shoes have rubbed blisters on the inside of each ankle. I’m still having to wear a gauze pad on each ankle when I wear them. The rest of the shoe fits the same.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Podiatrist Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had to go up 1/2 size. My podiatrist recommended these for help with stability. My orthotic fits well and they are comfortable. Time will tell whether they are worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Neer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is for my mother who is hard on her shoes. She likes them and wears them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Steele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I totally love the way my new balance fit they are so great
customer_reviews.author: Donna E Gurtlinger

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect,stability and probation control True to size,made IN USA.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit right out of the box and the first walk was super comfortable. Shoelaces only need one tie, no need to double knot.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is always my go to brand in sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, fit as expected, very comfortable, love New Balance sneakers, always well made and fit well. Never a complaint with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S. Alix

customer_reviews.title: Smeaker
customer_reviews.text: NB is a good walking & running sneaker and has a roomy toe bed.
customer_reviews.author: reggie

customer_reviews.title: Not true to fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered the NB 1540 V2 11D, I thought these would be a new version/ style. I ordered the same size and width. The shoes were too small and narrow. Dont know what went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like about this shoe is the tongue is to short, so you can't lace the shoes up as high as you want without it hurting your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Shoe works well for my plantar fasciitis, RN. Abuses feet !
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nockunas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: made in USA and much more expensive but the difference in build quality is obvious!
customer_reviews.author: Ohananapili

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased before seemed like this shoe must be a second run horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, just like the style I bought in stores.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Lots of support for my low arches. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: tongue in shoe is way too short.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the shoe except the short tongue made it impossible to tie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can wear these all day with out any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: S Meng

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: Best pair if New Balance shoes I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Can I return these shoes even if is after the September 6 date!  I have not worn them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes do not fit. I always wear a 9.5 These are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Primm

customer_reviews.title: Need a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Need a half size bigger after wearing them a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stabilizer keeps your foot from rolling.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect for me because of all the supporett has the stabilizer in them for extra support. I have several pairs. I do wish they made it in black for women.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Crawford

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's 1540v3 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: New Balances 1540v3 is made with technology that helps deliver support and stability to your run. Made with an ENCAP and Rollbar midsole technology, this womens runner offers superior rear foot motion control that supports you from 5K and beyond. Manufactured in the US for over 75 years and representing a limited portion of our US sales, New Balance Made is a premium collection that contains a domestic value of 70% or greater.
feature_bullets: ENCAP midsole technology provides support and maximum durability
Manufactured in the US for over 75 years and representing a limited portion of our US sales
ROLLBAR with Medial & Lateral TPU Posts for ultimate motion control
